ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Contract Status is internally approved when stage is moved to executed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Corporate_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Executed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( CLMS_Contract_Status__c , "Internally Approved")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract status must be Internally Approved
